name: Don't Sleep
description:
*if the game is not working on your browser, try a different one. Firefox works if Google Chrome does not. This game can also be played on your mobile*

This is my first interactive horror game, utilizing both prose and dark poetry. 

What you need to play: I highly recommend headphones so you can fully experience it. And maybe don't play in the dark if you get easily scared ... 

How to play: Just click the highlighted red text to continue. Try to click on all your options. Have fun navigating around, and replay if you missed something!

I hope you enjoy. Drop a comment down below on your thoughts. Thank you.
